document.discussion_title: Create an herb pot that fits in any home
document.topic_text: Create an herb pot that fits in any home Heidi Eng , wsts2 8:08 AM. PDT April 25, 2016 Master Gardener Ciscoe Morris CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST Cooking with herbs always makes for a great meal, but you don't have to spend a ton of money at the store on ingredients. Gardening wizard Ciscoe Morris stopped by New Day NW to show us how we can put together a flavorful herb pot of our very own. Copyright 2016 KING
